rows.label: qev031208_MSG0001
rows.name: Nnh...gh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0002
rows.name: LEROY! Are you all right? Why did you do this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0003
rows.name: Nrgh... Isn't it...obvious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0004
rows.name:
Match is decided. Lavina will return home.
Be with her own kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0005
rows.name: No, Father! I love him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0006
rows.name:
I will not allow it! Not just Earth alien, but weakling!
I will not give you to such creature![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0007
rows.name:
Come. Forget this nonsense, stubborn girl.
Do as I say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0008
rows.name: Father... I... I can still f-figh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0009
rows.name: You give up as well. You cannot fight like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I...can. And I w-will. I made myself a promise when
we ran here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0011
rows.name:
That it would be the last time I ran from anyone or
anything that wanted to hurt Lavina![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0012
rows.name: Hmph. Grand talk for weakling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0013
rows.name:
...Just what happened to this man?
You are also Earth alien. Do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev031208_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Leroy's love for Lavina has changed him.

rows.label: qev031208_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev031208_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Loda that you have no idea.

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0014
rows.name: Little man truly holds so much love for my daughter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0015
rows.name:
Why he not choose Earth alien to love?
And why he stand after taking such beating?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0016
rows.name: I not understand this Leroy at all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0017
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0018
rows.name: Lavina? We are going home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0019
rows.name: I told you thatâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0020
rows.name: But you will not be mate of Wazdo Tygant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0021
rows.name:
I will give your Earth alien chance to prove his mettle.
Now come. We go home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0022
rows.name: *gasp* Y-you mean...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0023
rows.name: Your father's right, Lavina. Go back with him for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'll become a man fit to earn his blessing,
then come back for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0025
rows.name: I will wait for you. As long as it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031208_MSG0026
rows.name:
But I wish to love you now. Not when I am old.
So do not take too long![ST:wait ]
